'''A Tale of Two Cities''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Opening Old Memories]].''

==Trivia==
*The name of the achievement is a reference to the 1859 historical novel {{w|A Tale of Two Cities}} by Charles Dickens.
